changeSet.author: kshakir
changeSet.comment: Delete the rows from CUSTOM_LABEL_ENTRY with duplicate (CLK, WEU) entries keeping only the rows with the largest primary key. Then drop the unique constraint that expands over the columns (CLK, CLV, WEU), replacing it with one that only covers the columns (CLK, WEU).

delete.where: CUSTOM_LABEL_ENTRY_ID NOT IN ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT MAX(CUSTOM_LABEL_ENTRY_ID) FROM CUSTOM_LABEL_ENTRY GROUP BY CUSTOM_LABEL_KEY, WORKFLOW_EXECUTION_UUID ) AS TEMPORARY_TABLE )
